Translations.Text: Ndarahiye kuri iki gisagara c’Imakkat
Na wewe uzomanuka muri iki gisagara nyene
Ndarahiye kukintu cavyaye, hamwe nicavutse
Yuko twaremye ikiremwa muntu mungorane nyinshi cane
Mbega yiyumvira yuko ata n’umwe yoshobora kumufata
Avuga ati:- narononye amatungo menshi cane
Mbega yiyumvira yuko ata n’umwe amubona
Mbega ntitwamuhaye amaso abiri
N’ururimi hamwe n’iminwa ibiri
Tumwereka inzira zose uko ari zibiri
Mbega yarawusatuye uwo musozi
None n’igiki kizo kumenyesha uwo musozi
N’uguha umushumvyi uburenganzira bwiwe n’iteka rimukwiye
Canke ukamurisha k’umusi w’ikigoyi
Impfuvyi y’umugenzi n’iyitari iyumugenzi
Canke umukene ataco yifashije
Hanyuma	abe	mubemeye	Imana	yiwe	y’ukuri,	nukuburirana ukwihangana nukuburirana mukugiriranira ikigongwe
Abo nibo bantu bo kuruhande rw’amahoro
Mugabo abahakanye amajambo yacu matagatifu, abo nibo bantu bo kuruhande rw’ishari
Umuriro wugarijwe kumpande zose uzoba uri hejuru yabo
Ndarahiye kw’Izuba no kumishwarara yaryo
No k’Ukwezi kugu kurikira
No k’Umutaga uku boneshereza
No kw’Ijoro mugihe kuripfuse
No ku Majuru hamwe n’uwayubatse
No kw’Isi hamwe n’uwayishashe
No k’umutima hamwe n’uwawuringanije
Hanyuma arawubwira amabi y’awo n’ivyiza vyawo
Ntankeka arafise intsinzi uwasukuye umutima wiwe
Kandi ntankeka yarahomvye uwa cinyije umutima wiwe
Ba Thamuda barahakanye Umuremyi wabo kubera ukuzimira kwabo
Mugihe yahagarara umwe mubabisha babo mukuru
Aho niho intumwa y’Imana yababwira iti:- iyi n’Ingamiya y’Imana ni muyireke hamwe n’ibinyobwa vyayo
Mugabo barayihakanye iyo ntumwa y’Imana barayica, kuri ivyo rero Umuremyi wabo aca arabahonya kubera ibicumuro vyabo nukuba hanagura burundu
Kandi ntibatinya ingaruka yavyo
Ndarahiye kw’Ijoro ripfuka ibintu vyose
No k’Umutaga utanga umuco wayo
No kuwaremye ikigabo n’ikigore
Yuko ibikorwa vyanyu bitandukanye
Umwe atanga nugutinya Imana yiwe
N’ukwemera ijambo ryiza
Tuzo mworohereza inzira yukuja mw’ijuru
N’uwigira ingumyi ntiyiteho kubindi biremwa nkawe
N’uguhakana ibintu vyiza
Tuzo mworohereza inzira y’ukuja muriro udahera
N’amatungo yiwe ntaco azomumarira mugihe azoba ariko aranyikira mu muriro udahera
Mu vy’ukuri nikuri twebwe kuba menyesha ibiremwa vyose inzira nziza hamwe n’inzira y’ishari
Mu vy’ukuri twebwe turafise Ijuru n’Isi
Rero nimugabe n’umuriro udahera waka n’inguvu nyinshi cane
Ntawuzo winjira mwo atari umuntu mubi
Ariwe ahakana n’ukuyiha umugongo iyi dini y’ukuri
Nuwu	gamburukira	Imana	yiwe	y’ukuri	azokingirwa	nuwo	muriro udahera
Uwutanga amatungo yiwe kugira ngo yisukure
Mugihe ata n’umwe yamugiriye ineza kugira ngo abe aramuriha iyo neza
Atari ukurondera impuhwe z’Umuremyi wiwe mutagatifu
Rero azoronka ikizo muhumuriza
Ndarahiye k’Umutaga
No kw’Ijoro riba rikwiragiye hose
Ntiyagusize Umuremyi wawe, canke ntiyashavuye
Ntankeka mugihe kiza kizoba ari ciza kuri wewe gusumba icabaye
N’Umuremyi wawe azoguha vyinshi kugeza aho uzoshima
Mbega nti yagusanze uri impfuvyi ica iguha uburaro n’uburamuko bwiza
Igusanga utazi kurongora inzira nayo irakurongora
Igusanga uri umukene iguha n’ubutunzi
Rero ntubonere impfuvyi
Kandi ntukankamire uwukubajije
N’imigisha y’Umuremyi wawe uyivuge
